channel.title: Manually Changing Combat Level?
channel.description: Ok im starting to work on a 525 and being the owner, I want to increase my level beyond the 138 max, and there is no option to manually do that in the "savedgames" folder where u can edit characters. I was wondering is there a way to manually increase my max level? It doesn't matter if it just looks higher or if i raise my stats above everyone but I want it to be only for me. Please help!

item.title: Manually Changing Combat Level?
item.dc:creator: @Sigtinius Sigtinius
item.description:
@Sigtinius wrote:

Ok im starting to work on a 525 and being the owner, I want to increase my level beyond the 138 max, and there is no option to manually do that in the “savedgames” folder where u can edit characters. I was wondering is there a way to manually increase my max level? It doesn’t matter if it just looks higher or if i raise my stats above everyone but I want it to be only for me. Please help!
